page.title: 11BEACH SURVEY
page.content: When we went to Portishead, Mr Lang and a few others did a{Beach Survey . Mr Lang got four sticks and stuck them in the ground into a shape of a square. The rocks were different colours purple, pink, white, black, grey, orange, yellow and brown. Some rocks were smooth some were round, others had holes and were jagged or flat.The biggest rocks were about seven inches long. We also saw pieces of Quartz,and fossils,shell and{sharks tooth.}The fossils were brown. The seaweed was green with bladders. There were bits of wood, bottle glass and sandgrains. There were alot of insects living about,such as sandhoppers,ants,water fleas.There were a lot of pebbles.It was very interesting to look at all the different things. {SACHEEN BLAMPIED
